LightningComponentBundle.description: This component allows users to select redirect actions in Salesforce Flow to any selected record

property.name: recId
property.label: Record ID of New Record
property.description: Enter the variable that contains the Salesforce record ID you want to navigate to on page load

property.name: ObjectAPIName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: Enter the API name of the object you are navigating to

property.name: DefaultNavigation
property.label: Load record on view or edit
property.description: acceptable input values are 'view' or 'edit' for this field.
